content:
sthuthi, anuthaapakkaar mumpil
vaathil thurakkum-raajaavaameesho
/tpaatha-kiyaam njaanarththicchu;
/tnalvara-daanatthaal modam.
Nalkuka bhaavuka daathaave!'
theeraname njaan-ninnute kinnaramaayu.

Vaanavanaam thaathaa-yaachikkunnatiyaar
ee shushrooshaye e-ttaardratha thonnenam.

Vaanavar thaanneeshaa- maanavar than-gathiye,
ee shushrooshaye e-ttaardratha thonnenam.

akhilam njaanaaraanjittum
dyvabhayatthe mikacchonnum
njaan darshicchilla-thal snehatthaale
dhaarmmikanaam yauseppaarnnu-misrem raajathvam
mahithan moosha vibhaagicchaan-vatiyaal vaaridhiye
/thaananiyaadyanmaara thinaal-
/tagniyilninnum rakshitharaayu
thankatthekkaalathu kaamyam;
madhu vilumathu madhuram paaram
dyvaaraadhanaye-snehippon dhanyan.

kataloram vazhi pokumpol
anyonyam vettitthinnum
mathsyatthe darshi-cchaarnnenaashcharyam.
Vismayasahitham nilkkumpol-chinthicchevam njaan
bhuvane thammil vizhungunno-rundee marthyarilum,
/tnyaayavidhikkettheetaattha
/tjeeviye enthinu nindicchu;
kanmumpil vidhikandaalum
parane vizhungum martthuyanmaar
kuttakkaaravare - elkkunnon dhanyan.

Vrutthikalaal kartthaave! Njaan
nin kopatthinu paathramathaayu
karunaabdhe! Nee kopikkaa;
susthirame nin nirmmalathu.

Nibi vaakyam pol janamellaam
jalabindu kkalkkoppamathaam
nyrmmalyatthe bhajippaan
thinmaykkengane saadhikkum.

Praarththana ketteetunnone!
Yaachana nalkeetunnone!
Praarththanayil preethyaa' sadayam
yaachanaye nalkeetaname.

neethijnjanmaar-maddhye kashtam!-njaan thunayatton.
/tsanmaarggam njaan sheelicchilla.
/thaa! Njaananyan-thal perunnaalil;
en dushkruthyam-paayicchitunnavareennenne.

/t(pattakkaarundenkil thutarnnu dhoopapraarththanakal natatthunnu. Illaatthapaksham kuriyelaayistton .. Kuri.. Kuri.. Njangalute kartthaave! Njangalutemel anugraham cheyyunname ennathum kartthu praarththanayum cholli avasaanippikkunnu.)
(saadhaaranayaayi ivite dhoopapraarththana avasaanikkunnu. Velliyaazhcha muthalaaya sleebaaye smarikkunna prathyeka divasangalil sleebaayute kookkiliyonum chollendathaakunnu.)
